text:
When importing into a jsp page I encountered the following problem (somewhat
generalised).

The filename in the parameter in

<c:import url="/dosomething?filename=/abc/./../def/filename.xml"
charEncoding="UTF-8" />

was received (request.getParameter("file")) as 

/abc/def/filename.xml

Using param solves this problem, but I wonder what happens if you do

<c:import url="/abc/./../def/dosomething" charEncoding="UTF=8"/>
creator: veenendaal@inl.nl
